venue.name: Atlantic Avenue and Surface Artery South

item.description:
Let's get together for a friendly photo challenge in Boston.  Save the date for a 2-3-hour event that will challenge the way you normally shoot.  There will be prizes, entertainment and an opportunity to put yourself outside the box when it comes to shooting.

The challenge will take place within a radius that includes the waterfront, the North End and Faneuil Hall.  A list of challenges will be given out to inspire you and there will be a process set up for submitting entries and voting at the end.  

A small prize and bragging rights will be awarded to the winner.

There will be a $1.00 fee to enter the challenge (in addition to the $1.00 donation).
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Greenway Carousel Near Faneuil Hall
item.why: Stretch your imagination and your shooting skills!
item.name: CityScape Photo Challenge
